message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.GR, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of 3D layout recovery in indoor scenes, which is a core research topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also mentions real-time applications like robot navigation and AR/VR, which fall under robotics (cs.RO) and graphics (cs.GR) respectively. The use of EquiConvs, a type of convolution applied directly on the sphere projection, suggests the use of deep learning techniques (cs.AI, cs.LG).
